title: The Melbourne suburbs where the most part-time workers live

title: India reviews Press Note 3, may ease small FDI entry with de minimis rule
desc: Press Note 3, which made prior government approval mandatory for foreign direct investment (FDI) from bordering countries, was introduced in April 2020 to curb opportunistic takeovers of domestic companies during the pandemic — primarily targeted at those originating from China.

title: Men lose their Y chromosome as they age. Now we know why this matters
desc: This loss, evident in almost half of older men, is associated with serious diseases throughout the body and a shorter lifespan.
